name: @touchspin/renderer-vanilla
description: Vanilla CSS-based renderer for TouchSpin components without framework dependencies

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:js
scripts.build:js: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir dist esmEntry=index.js classModule=index.js css=index.css
scripts.build:test: cp src/index.test.ts src/index.ts.bak && mv src/index.ts src/index.ts.orig && mv src/index.test.ts src/index.ts && tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && mv src/index.ts src/index.test.ts && mv src/index.ts.orig src/index.ts && rm -f src/index.ts.bak && mkdir -p ./devdist/themes && cp ./src/themes/vanilla.css ./devdist/themes/ && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir devdist esmEntry=index.js classModule=VanillaRenderer.js css=themes/vanilla.css
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --watch --emitDeclarationOnly" "tsup src/index.ts --format esm --watch --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json" "yarn watch:css"
scripts.test: node ../../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/renderers/vanilla/tests && PLAYWRIGHT_TSCONFIG=../../../tsconfig.playwright.json TS_BUILD_TARGET=dev playwright test --config=../../../playwright.config.ts packages/renderers/vanilla/tests --reporter=list

author: TouchSpin Contributors
